body.name: Neck Gaiter Bandana Face Mask: Sun Cooling Scarf Gator Cover Head for Men Women
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 10 mins
features: 🚴【COMFORTABLE & BREATHABLE】 Our bandana gaitor mask is made of polyester, it is skin-friendly, lightweight and breathable. And it has exceptional absorbing and wicking features to keep you dry while wearing. Perfect fit for Women and Men.

🚴【WIND AND DUST PROOF】 When going out for running, cycling, skiing, snowboarding or motorcycling, wearing it as a face scarf, headband, bandanna mask gater, facemask gaiter or neck gaiter can protect your face, and avoid your nose and mouth clean from breathing dust. What’s more, it has performance of windproof.

🚴【MULTI-WAYS TO WEAR】 This neck gaiters for women and men have more than 12 different dress ways, it can be used as a neck gaiter, head wrap, face scarf, balaclava, headband, scarf, bandana, beanie cap, hood, buff headwear and wristband. Fashion design can make you look great on any occasion. It is also a great gift for you and friends and a good choice for walking, yoga, fishing, hunting, sports, riding a bike or music festival.

🚴【ONE SIZE FOR ALL】 The neck gaiter face cover shield is easy to wear with good stretchy and elasticity. It won’t cause discomfort or sultry feeling when worn on. One size for most people and gives a free wearing experience. The natural length and width is 17.8 x 9.6 inch.

🚴【PERFECT FOR OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES】When you outside and working more or less alone, the gaiter mask helps you a lot. The cooling neck gaiter can make you feel more cool for fishing, running, cycling, motorcycle, yoga, hiking, walking, workout and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multiple ways to wear: Our neck gaiter is designed for protecting from dust, wind, sand and sun. It is breathable and lightweight, soft and skin-friendly, elastic and quick-drying. Furthermore, you can use it as a sunscreen mask, balaclava, turban, neck protector, headband, wristband, pirate hat, eye mask, face towel and any other way you can imagine. Suitable for all kinds of outdoor activities: Our Bandana Mask is not only fashionable clothing accessories, but also essential equipment for adventure lovers, suitable for running, hiking, yoga, cycling, fishing, hunting and skiing. If you are a sports enthusiast, you can also use it as a headband or wristband to prevent sweat from flowing into your eyes and provide you with a more comfortable outdoor experience.

Versatile, Comfortable, Breathable Neck Gaiters for Most People Moisture Wicking Design: Skin-friendly and quick-dry fabric lets your cover bandana dry in minutes, which keeps you cool in the sun. Dust & Wind Proof: The neck gaiter can help protect you from harmful UV and guards you against wind and dust. One Size For Most: Breathable neck gaiter is easy to put on and off, suitable for all men & women, one size fits all design offers you versatile ways of use. Applications: Cycling, fishing, hiking, running, skateboarding, skiing etc.

Sweat Absorption & Breathable Our neck gaiter is breathable which can absorb sweat and dry out quickly. It is very suitable and comfortable to wear on rainy days or in the sun, keep the part dry and cool, bringing more concentrated sports experience. Exquisite Seaming Edge Design The upgraded seaming edge can effectively prevent the cooling gaiter mask from wearing and rolling up, thus to improve the service life of the mask. Four Way Stretching The neck protector is made of soft and skin-friendly spandex material, which has great elasticity and can be stretched in four directions to improve elasticity and tensile strength. Therefore, one size for most people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They filled the bill Nice and warm with a good stretch. Seams seem to be well done and of all good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are very comfortable. Wore mine for hours and no issues. I really like mine. They are nice and stretchy, easy wear. I would say I’d buy more but with how sturdy this thing is I might not need to for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Quality but Too Loose for Small Faces
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these gaiters to pull up over my nose to keep out the dust during outdoor activities, hiking, etc., and also to keep the sun off my neck. They are nice quality and lightweight for summer wear. Mine came with the finished stitched hems as shown in the photo. For purposes of wearing around the neck, they would be fine, but they were much too loose to wear over my nose. Unless I pulled them all the way up over the top of my head, the gaiters kept falling off my face. My husband has a medium-sized face and they were a bit too loose for him also. I ended up ordering a different style with a drawstring to keep the gaiter in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight for sure
reviews.reviewText: These are definitely lightweight. I bought them to cover my ears while running in the cold, and they do just an ok job. Probably should have gotten some merino wool ones. Fit is great for me, as a male who wears a average size hat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable face cover
reviews.reviewText: Need to wear at work, very comfortable, easy to clean. cool, not too hot for wearing all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Missing the blue mask
reviews.reviewText: The masks are a good quality and the 3 masks that we got have a nice feel and look to them. But I paid for 4 masks and only got 3. I’m not very happy about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great value at this price
reviews.reviewText: Nice lightweight, stretchy gaiter for ppl who want sun coverage in warm weather. I wear this up over back of head and under chin, with a ball cap on to hold it in place and shade my face, with gaiter covering ears and all sides of neck. Wore this in CA sun working outside in 80 degree weather for 6 hours. I have light skin and there was no apparent tanning or sunburn underneath the gaiter. It also stayed fairly cool -- a thin, stretchy, spandex-y material. I don't know how it would do at 100 degrees, but at 80 degrees it was quite cool even though I was working. There may be better products out there, but this is an excellent value at this price-point. I wish they made them in white and a light tan to go with some of my other clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neck gaiter bandana face mask
reviews.reviewText: Since I have taken up hiking i am becoming more familiar with things that are needed for these 4am photography hikes. I realized that it is very cold at that hour of the morning and my jacket just isn’t enough to keep me warm because most of your heat is in your head and these bandanas help to keep my neck and face warm during those early morning frosty days😉
Halt ein paar Halstücher /Schals für meinen Mann. Er hat sich gefreut und ist mit den Farben und der Qualität sehr zufrieden.
Product received is not the same as shown in photos. Product is like cut out from left out cloth sheets. Borders are also not stitched.
Quality is good seems to be cotton and nice to wear in any season helpful when you travelProtect you from dust.
